articles.content: Americas poor track record vaccinating people against the flu spells trouble for the coming effort to immunize the nation against COVID-19, experts say, particularly in rural areas where the novel co… [+11510 chars]

articles.author: Robin McKie
articles.title: The vaccine miracle: how scientists waged the battle against Covid-19 - The Guardian
articles.description: We trace the extraordinary research effort, from the discovery of the virus’s structure to the start of inoculations this week
articles.content: In the early afternoon of 3 January this year, a small metal box was delivered to the Shanghai Public Health Clinical Centre addressed to virus expert Prof Zhang Yongzhen. Inside, packed in dry ice, … [+11294 chars]
